activities.desc: Savor a delicious buffet lunch featuring international and local Egyptian cuisine at the resort's main restaurant.

activities.title: Beach Time & Pool Relaxation
activities.desc: Spend the afternoon relaxing on the resort's private beach or by the pool. Take your first dip in the crystal-clear Red Sea waters.

activities.title: Dinner & Evening Entertainment
activities.desc: Enjoy a gourmet dinner followed by live entertainment at the resort's theater. Shows include traditional folklore shows or international performances.

itinerary.title: Snorkeling Adventure & Beach Activities
itinerary.description: Breakfast & Preparation. Start your day with a hearty breakfast buffet. Pick up your snorkeling equipment from the water center.

activities.title: Guided Snorkeling Tour
activities.desc: Join our experienced guide for an unforgettable snorkeling experience at Ras Mohammed National Park or nearby coral reefs. Explore vibrant marine life.

activities.title: Beachside Lunch
activities.desc: Enjoy lunch at the beach restaurant with stunning sea views. Fresh seafood and salads are our picks.

activities.title: Free Time & Water Sports
activities.desc: Relax on the beach or try optional activities like diving, parasailing, or banana boat rides (additional cost).

activities.title: Themed Dinner Night
activities.desc: Experience a special themed dinner (Italian, Asian, or Egyptian Night depending on the day). Dance the night away at the resort bar.

itinerary.title: Leisure Morning & Departure
itinerary.description: Farewell Breakfast. Start your day with a final breakfast. Soak up remaining sun rays before check-out.

activities.title: Final Beach Time
activities.desc: Savor the last moments on the beach.

activities.title: Check-out & Airport Transfer
activities.desc: Check out from the resort. Our driver will transfer you to the airport for your flight home.

reviewsList.text: Absolutely amazing experience! The resort was beautiful, the food was delicious, and the snorkeling was breathtaking. Highly recommend!
A perfect vacation. Everything was organized perfectly, from the airport transfer to the daily activities. Will definitely come back.
Great trip overall. The hotel is fantastic. The only downside was the flight delay, but that's not the agency's fault.

trips.title: Hurghada Beach & Desert Safari
trips.description: Combine beach relaxation with thrilling quad biking and Bedouin culture experience.

itinerary.title: Desert Adventure
itinerary.description: Afternoon quad bike safari into the desert. Visit a Bedouin village, drink tea, and enjoy a BBQ dinner.

itinerary.title: Red Sea Relaxation
itinerary.description: Relax on the beach or go for a snorkeling trip before departure.

reviewsList.text: The quad biking was so much fun! A must do.

trips.title: Dahab
trips.description: Perfect for adventure seekers - world-class diving spots and peaceful yoga retreats.

itinerary.title: Arrival
itinerary.description: Arrival in Dahab.

itinerary.title: Blue Hole
itinerary.description: Snorkeling at the Blue Hole.

itinerary.title: Blue Lagoon
itinerary.description: Relaxing day at Blue Lagoon.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Check out.

trips.title: Nuweibaa & Ras Shaitain
trips.description: A peaceful seaside retreat in eco-friendly huts with campfires lights.

itinerary.title: Arrival to Camp
itinerary.description: Check into your beach hut.

itinerary.title: Hiking Colored Canyon
itinerary.description: Hike through the colorful rock formations.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Head back home.

trips.title: Fayoum
trips.description: A quick adventure: lakes, waterfalls, deserts, and sandboarding.

itinerary.title: Full Day Tour
itinerary.description: Drive to Fayoum, visit waterfalls, sandboard at Magic Lake, lunch at Tunis Village, return to Cairo.

trips.title: Alexandria
trips.description: A charming getaway to the Mediterranean bride: history and sea food.

itinerary.title: City Tour
itinerary.description: Visit the Library and Citadel.

itinerary.title: Montaza & Departure
itinerary.description: Walk in Montaza gardens.

trips.title: White Desert
trips.description: Unearthly landscapes with white chalk rock formations.

itinerary.title: Safari
itinerary.description: Drive to Bahariya, transfer to 4x4, camping in White Desert.

itinerary.title: Return
itinerary.description: Breakfast and return to Cairo.

trips.title: Alexandria
trips.description: A charming getaway to the Mediterranean bride: history and sea food.
